products.product_description:
Gemstone Oil Anti-Stress

This oil promotes the tranquillity and strength needed to tackle everyday stresses, while boosting stamina. To enhance the effects, each bottle contains a small gemstone. This precious gemstone oil is produced in an elaborate and patented process.
products.usage:
- BODY MASSAGE OIL: Gemstone oil can be used like any massage oil. It can also be used for your daily body care after taking a shower (apply to moist skin). It absorbs wonderfully and leaves a gentle scent on the skin. In Monika Grundmann’s Crystal Balance Massage, the oil and massage stones are slightly warmed on a small stove. It can also be used selectively on particular parts of the body. «Regeneration» oil, for instance, has been shown to strengthen the bodies natural resistance when applied to the thymus gland, while «Joy Of Life» oil, applied to the soles of the feet, activates the flow of energy. 
 - REFLEX ZONE MASSAGE: Since the entire body can be stimulated through the reflex zones (feet, hands, back etc.), gemstone oil is also excellently suited to this method of application. 
 - FACIAL OIL: Due to its rapid absorbtion and silky consistency, it is highly recommended for facial massage and facial skincare. 
 - BATH OIL: The effect of the oil is enhanced by the warmth of the water. Two tablespoons per bath are sufficient. The skin is soft and velvety, making subsequent oiling unnecessary.

products.product_description:
thorough cleansing to reduce tartar and combat swollen gums

Dr. Hauschka MED Mint Refreshing Toothpaste cleanses thoroughly and prevents the build-up of tartar and plaque. 

The formulation contains carefully selected medicinal plant extracts, natural essential oils and mineral cleansing agents that ensure the thorough removal of plaque and stabilise the flora of the oral cavity. White clay and diatomaceous earth provide double-strength natural cleansing and are combined with mineral-rich water to form the basis of this well-tolerated toothpaste. Extracts of neem leaves, horse chestnut and mastic – a common ingredient in traditional dentistry – stabilise and care for the oral cavity. Antimicrobial essential oils from peppermint, clove and chamomile have anti-inflammatory properties and provide long-lasting fresh breath. 

Dr. Hauschka MED Mint Refreshing Toothpaste contains no added fluorides or surfactants. 
The product’s effectiveness is clinically proven.

products.product_description:
advanced night care

Dr. Hauschka oil-free night care allows your skin to breathe freely while guiding its natural renewal processes. Renewing Night Conditioner balances all skin conditions: Dry skin is encouraged to retain oil and moisture, while sensitive skin is soothed and fortified. Oily, blemished skin is calmed, and rough skin is smoothed. 

Formulation: Rhythmitised plant extracts of witch hazel, madonna lily and silver support the skin’s night-time powers of renewal.
products.usage:
Skin cells are renewed every 28 days. Mirroring this same regenerative rhythm, Renewing Night Conditioner should be used for 28 days in place of your daily night-time skin care. We recommend one course of treatment per year for each decade of life (for example three times a year at the age of 30).  Apply nightly after cleansing. Break off the top of 2 ampoules, squeeze liquid into palms and press gently and evenly into the face (including the lip and eye areas), neck, earlobes and décolleté. From week 4, only use 1 ampoule. 

Outside this application period, we recommend a Dr. Hauschka Serum for daily, oil-free night care and Dr. Hauschka daytime products in the mornings.

products.product_description:
intensive skin care, stabilises areas of very dry, itchy skin, also in the case of atopic dermatitis

Dr. Hauschka MED Ice Plant Intensive Cream stabilises very dry, flaky, itchy skin and provides intensive, targeted nourishment for particularly dehydrated areas. The formulation of pressed ice plant juice activates the skin’s own moisturising abilities while nourishing botanical oils and waxes stabilise its barrier function to help it rediscover its natural oil and moisture balance. By using the valuable freshly pressed ice plant juice in a concentrated form, the cream provides an intense moisture boost and helps the skin retain this moisture for longer. The combination of avocado oil, sesame oil, mango butter, shea butter, almond oil and jojoba oil is perfectly tailored to the needs of very dry skin or skin suffering from atopic dermatitis. The richly nourishing cream provides noticeable and lasting relief from dryness, tautness and itchiness. Studies confirm excellent skin compatibility and results, even on atopic dermatitis. Ice Plant Intensive Cream is deliberately unfragranced and is also suitable for infants.
products.usage:
Apply to the affected areas of skin several times a day as required.
As supplementary daily care, we recommend Dr. Hauschka MED Ice Plant Face Cream and Dr. Hauschka MED Ice Plant Body Care Lotion. For the targeted treatment of reddened, itchy skin we recommend Dr. Hauschka MED Potentilla Soothing Cream.

products.product_description:
specialised care for skin during menopause

Dr. Hauschka Intensive Treatments are formulated for skin that has lost its natural balance and requires focused care. Intensive Treatment for Menopausal Skin balances hormonally related skin changes while supporting your skin’s natural processes of renewal. The appearance of blotchiness and spots is diminished for a calm, even complexion.

Formulation: Rhythmitised dilutions of daisy and rose work with gemstones argentite, ruby powder and black cohosh to revitalise dull, lifeless skin and reduce the appearance of redness and irregular pigmentation.
products.usage:
Skin cells are renewed every 28 days. Mirroring this same regenerative cycle, Intensive Treatment for Menopausal Skin should be used as skin care for 28 days. Intensive Treatment for Menopausal Skin works most effectively when used four times a year as a stimulus.

After morning and evening cleansing, mist 4-5 pumps onto the face, neck and décolleté then gently press into the skin. One bottle should provide a full 28 day course.

Additional support: We recommend daily care with our full range of Regenerating products.

products.product_description:
strengthens the gums and keeps breath fresh

Dr. Hauschka MED Sage Mouthwash cleanses and protects the oral cavity while supporting the natural flora of the mouth. The scientifically developed formulation contains carefully selected medicinal plants extracts that combat plaque formation in hard-to-reach areas and prevent inflammation in the oral cavity. The central ingredient is sage, which is known for its anti-inflammatory properties. Astringent extracts of rhatany, neem leaves, myrrh, potentilla and horse chestnut bark strengthen and fortify the gums, while the combination of antimicrobial essential oils help keep breath fresh for longer. This Sage Mouthwash contains no added fluorides or surfactants and is suitable for permanent use. Clinical studies confirm positive results.
products.usage:
Shake bottle before use. Squeeze the child-proof cap at the points indicated and turn to open. Fill the cap with the ready-to-use mouthwash. Rinse around in the mouth for 30 seconds, gargle thoroughly, then spit out.
Contains approx. 9% alcohol by weight: Please do not swallow; not suitable for children.

products.product_description:
NATUR PUR BIOLIFT Multi-Intensiv-Serum
The anti-oxidant, nourishing serum for universal use provides pure nature for 100% effectiveness. It is suited for any skin age, blends fully into the skin. 

The extra-rich concentrate eases skin tightness and helps the skin to recover from flakiness and irritation. Pure grape seed oil, sesame oil and rice bran oil revive neglected skin. The skin’s “youth” is extended. Skin damage caused by light is repaired and the formation of new cells supported. Valuable moisture is retained and the skin feels velvety-smooth. 

Additional information
Natur Pur A – for demanding skin 
NATUR PUR lives up to the most recent findings in modern organic cosmetics. It was developed in the traditional, holistic knowledge about the beneficial use of precious vegetable oils and natural essences in skin treatment. No mineral oil products, no PEG’s, no silicones, no synthetic preservatives, fragrances or colouring, all ingredients are of natural origin.

Dr. Hauschka Hair Tonic balances and strengthens all scalp and hair conditions. The oil-free formulation of neem, nettle, birch bark, arnica and burdock root addresses a variety of hair and scalp needs. If hair is producing too much oil, the hair tonic has a normalising effect, thus preventing the formation of dandruff. With fine hair, the tonic provides more volume and strength.
products.usage:
The pump spray enables fast and easy application. Use after every hair wash, or daily if necessary. Our Hair Tonic can be applied to damp or dry hair. Part the hair and spray evenly onto the scalp. Use the fingertips to gently massage in. Do not rinse out. For use as a blow dry lotion, apply generously to damp hair.

We recommend Dr. Hauschka Shampoo and Dr. Hauschka Conditioner for general hair care. For brittle and badly damaged hair, we recommend Dr. Hauschka Hair Oil.

products.product_description:
nourishes intensely damaged hair, soothes the scalp

Dr. Hauschka Hair Oil restores shine and vitality to all hair conditions. The oil offers intensive, restorative care for dry, damaged, brittle and lacklustre hair. It is also especially well-suited for use with an irritated scalp and with permed or coloured hair, as well as hair damaged by heat styling or the sun. The formulation of neem, chamomile, wheatgerm oil and rosemary strengthens hair and soothes the scalp. The combined power of valuable medicinal plant extracts gives hair new strength and body.
products.usage:
Shake before use. Cloudiness or the formation of sediment can occur as a result of the natural ingredients and do not affect the quality of the product.

The Hair Oil can be used in various ways depending on the needs of the scalp and hair:

 - Before washing: Dampen the hair and evenly distribute Hair Oil through the lengths and tips. Leave for at least 20 minutes, or overnight for very damaged hair. Shampoo and rinse twice. For scalp care, dampen the scalp and use the fingertips to massage in the Hair Oil. Wrap in a towel and leave to work for approx. 20 minutes, or overnight for a highly irritated scalp. Shampoo and rinse twice.

 - After washing: To treat dry, split ends, apply a very small amount to the tips (either slightly damp or dry). Do not rinse out.

Dr. Hauschka MED Ice Plant Body Care Lotion provides fortifying nourishment for very dry, flaky, tight skin, leaving it feeling soft and smooth with no greasy shine. The formulation of pressed ice plant juice activates the skin’s own moisturising abilities, while high-quality botanical oils fortify its natural barrier function. The valuable freshly pressed juice of the ice plant replenishes the skin’s moisture levels and helps it to retain this moisture for longer. The combination of avocado oil, mango butter, shea butter, almond oil and jojoba oil is perfectly tailored to the needs of very dry skin and skin suffering from atopic dermatitis. The easily absorbed lotion provides noticeable and lasting relief from dryness, reduces tautness and prevents itchiness. Studies confirm excellent skin compatibility and results, even on atopic dermatitis. Ice Plant Body Care Lotion is deliberately unfragranced and is also suitable for infants.

gentle cleansing for sensitive teeth, also in the case of periodontitis

Dr. Hauschka MED Saltwater Sensitive Toothpaste provides gentle yet thorough cleansing for sensitive teeth. 

The formulation combines mineral saltwater, sea salt and plant extracts with natural cleansing agents to gently remove plaque and protect sensitive teeth. Mineral saltwater from the spa town of Bad Dürrenberg and sea salt obtained by natural, traditional extraction stimulates the natural production of saliva, neutralises harmful acids and supports the re-mineralisation of the teeth. Mastic, or Arabic gum, is a common ingredient in traditional dentistry that stabilises and cares for the oral cavity. Witch hazel water strengthens the oral mucosa. The antimicrobial essential oils of sage, thyme and lemon care for the oral cavity and provide fresh breath. 

Dr. Hauschka MED Saltwater Sensitive Toothpaste strengthens the gums and prevents bleeding. The product’s effectiveness is clinically proven. This fresh and pleasantly salty toothpaste contains no added fluorides or surfactants. Following homeopathic recommendations, it also contains no peppermint or menthol.
products.usage: Clean the teeth regularly for about 3 minutes, using circular motions and applying only gentle pressure. Rinse thoroughly.

products.usage:
Cleanse in the morning and evening. Moisten face, neck and décolleté with a warm face cloth. Mix ½-1 inch / 1-2 cm of Cleansing Cream with warm water in the palms to form a smooth, creamy paste. Press mixture gently onto skin then roll hands up and away in a wave-like motion. Start in the centre of the forehead then slowly work outward and down.

Avoid the eye area. Repeat the press and roll action 2-3 times. Do not rub or scrub. Rinse with warm water then finish with a splash of cool, fresh water to close pores. For sensitive skin use warm water only.

products.product_description:
At least 55% pine heartwood extract

PineVital Body Lotion is an extraordinary and extremely effective skin care for the daily application.

Not only because of its high share of effective pine heartwood ingredients is the lotion particularly valuable, but the entire combination of perfectly compatible active ingredients also makes it so unique.

Selected oils from coconut, jojoba, thistle, almond and shea butter provide the velvety-soft skin feeling.

The refreshing and soothing effect of the pine ingredients is enhanced by sea buckthorn and verbena extracts.

All ingredients are carefully selected, so that they support the alleviating and beneficial effect the pine heartwood extract has on the skin.

-    Makes the skin velvety and soft
-    Supplies the skin with moisture and reduces the tension feeling
-    Enhances the natural barrier function of the skin

PineVital Body Lotion is suitable as skin care for normal to dry but also for irritated and inflammation-prone skin.
products.usage: Apply in the morning and/or the evening as needed – most effective on cleaned skin. Massaging it in gently improves the blood circulation in the skin and makes it supple and tender. For the care of normal to very dry skin – for face, hands and body. Also ideal for the supporting care for irritated skin. In this case, the effect can be enhanced, if you spray care water on the skin before anointing it.

   ** from natural essential oils
products.product_description:
Contains at least 59% pine heartwood extract

PineVital Natural Shampoo nurtures and protects hair and scalp in a special way. The active pine heartwood ingredients provide healthy and supple hair and, moreover, enhance the vitality of the scalp. The spectrum of active substances in the pine extract is completed by natural essences such as camomile extract, stinging nettle extract and wheat proteins which provide sheen, suppleness and body.

-    Provides shining and supple hair
-    Soothes and nurtures the scalp
-    Unique combination of active substances – purely natural

PineVital Natural Shampoo is an equally effective and mild natural product, which gently cleans hair and scalp without drying out or straining them.

Good for the hair
Not only do the pine heartwood ingredients nurture the hair, but also does the stinging nettle extract give the hair body and hold, due to its high share of silicic acid. Wheat proteins provide the hair with sheen and suppleness and furthermore enhance the combability of the hair.

Good for the scalp
The pine heartwood extract strengthens the skin’s own protective barrier, soothes itching and improves skin appearance. Thus, the shampoo on the extract basis is not only valuable for hair care but also ideal for scalp care.
products.usage: Massage the usual amount of shampoo into the wet hair. Allow to soak for a short while and rinse well afterwards. To enhance the effect, massage PineVital Liquid Care into hair after drying. For the daily care of normal hair, but also ideal for a dry, itching and scaly scalp.

     * ingredients from certified organic agriculture
products.product_description:
SANTE plant hair colors are colors to feel good! 100% vegetable hair colour, which gives a natural and lasting colour result. The hair colors are ultra-gentle, long-lasting and care for your hair while dyeing. The vegetable hair colours do not lighten the hair, but adapt to the natural hair colour.

The plant hair colours contain only carefully selected natural raw materials such as finely ground organic henna, ground herbs and fruits. Caring wheat proteins give your hair a fascinating shine. SANTE Herbal Hair Colors are mixtures of wheat protein, alginate, henna, cassia, walnut shells, indigo, coffee, beetroot and rhubarb root. The mixture and weight proportions of the ingredients are different in each color.

The proven plant hair colours in powder form in 9 expressive shades. The plant hair colour in powder form is simply activated with hot water. The result is a creamy, non-dripping paste which is applied to the hair. Depending on the starting colour and nuance, the application time is between 15 minutes and 2 hours.

     * From Organic farming
products.product_description:
EASY LIFTING SERUM was developed by the N&B laboratories in order to offer an organic product, effective to fight in an immediate and evident way against the signs of cutaneous ageing, fully respecting the skin.

The causes of wrinkles are essentially two:
1. biological causes, related to the natural aging and oxidation of the skin;
2. mechanical causes, due to the contraction of facial muscles, responsible for horizontal and vertical lines, also known as "expression wrinkles".

EASY LIFTING SERUM is a extraordinary and effective solution to these problems and quickly acts against expression wrinkles and cutaneous ageing. It has an intensive anti-ageing power and has been realized with pure Aloe Vera organic gel, enriched with Argan Oil, Hyaluronic Acid, Wheat Germs Oil and proteins of Hibiscus seeds.
Thanks to its combination of natural active principles it immediately makes the skin elastic, velvet-like and more compact, helping the natural cell renewal, and giving the skin a younger, velvety and compact skin (natural lifting effect).

TARGETED ACTION:
Thanks to the natural ingredients of EASY LIFTING SERUM it is possible to get the following cosmetic actions:
LIFTING ACTION: thanks to the presence of ingredients such as Argan Oil, Hyaluronic Acid. Wheat Germs Oil, the skin receives more elasticity, with an evident and intensive lifting effect.FILLER ACTION: the proteins of Hibiscus seeds create a real filler action that visibly reduce the wrinkles volume.BRIGHTNESS - SMOOTH SKIN: the extracts of Aloe Vera give the skin the right balance, in order to support the anti-ageing action and make the skin soft and radiant.
products.usage: It is advised to apply EASY LIFTING SERUM one/two times a day on eyes contour area, lips contour area and décolleté avoiding the direct contact with eyes. In order to let the product being better absorbed it is furthermore advised to use small quantities of it and massage until absorption.

products.certification_description: At least 95% of natural and/or derived natural ingredients, where applicable, stem from organic agriculture or controlled harvesting of wild plants.

     * From Organic farming
products.product_description:
Water is the basic element of which the skin can't do without. Water should be taken not only internally but also through an emulsion which helps to moisturize and nourish the outside layer in a proper way.
The product used by men and women in order to give the skin the needed hydration is for sure the "Body Lotion" which can be considered as a present for the wellness of your skin.
Laziness, atmospheric agents or just a lack of time and attention to ourselves undermine the natural hydration of our body and it can happen that the water reserve is altered, leading to an unpleasant result: an extremely dry and lifeless skin.

To solve this discomfort we sometimes rely just on liquid emulsions which can be easily found in supermarkets with the conviction to do something good for the skin, ignoring the harmful ingredients that these products often contain. Any kind of cream is able to provide hydration and nutrition to the skin, but only apparently!
It is thanks to the use of a high quality cream, rich in active principles with emollient, anti-oxidant and nourishing action, that you are able to soften the skin by increasing the humidity content, and to ensure an absorption with results that persist for the whole day and not just for the first moments after application.

The result of the careful research carried out by the N&B laboratories is BODY LOTION, a delicate and refined emulsion ideal for the whole body, rich in natural active ingredients, formulated to help your skin to restore a perfect balance. BODY LOTION is able to protect the skin even in case of redness and leaving it for a long soft velvety. Furthermore it does not contain any kind of harmful substance as Parabens, paraffin, SLS and coloring aggressive substances.

BODY LOTION has been realized by the N&B Laboratories with organic extracts which directly derives from the warm ground of a farm in Salento, a few steps away from the manufacturing laboratories, guaranteed and certified organic by ECOGRUPPO ITALIA and NATRUE.

Thanks to the extraordinary properties of fresh Aloe Vera Gel extract, combined with extra virgin Olive Oil and Vitamin E contained in Wheat Germ Oil, Apricot kernel oil and sweet Almond Oil, Body Lotion fully perform the following three main functions:
MOISTURIZING ACTION, when the water reserve is not in the ideal conditions to support the needs of the body, due to outside agents or to carelessness for the own well being.
EMOLLIENT ACTION, when, due to the lack of hydration, the skin becomes dry and cracked with results that are often troublesome.PROTECTIVE ACTION, quando la naturale idratazione viene attaccata da elementi esterni che rendono la pelle più sensibile e potenzialmente più aggredibile (even in case of sun exposure).

The presence of hyaluronic acid helps to fight skin imperfections caused the passage of time and makes the skin more elastic and tonic.
Thanks to the presence of all these active principles and to our meticulous care to create a product we have realized BODY LOTION, a body cream that helps t o restore the right amount of water into the skin in order to reconstitute the hydrolipidic mantle. BODY LOTION can also help to prevent skin aging, giving back the skin softness and elasticity and keeping it toned, elastic and bright.

BODY LOTION can be applied at any time of the day on the whole body and is able to give an immediate and pleasant feeling of revitalizing "well-being and freshness". It should be massaged gently and with circular movements until completely absorbed, starting from the bottom and moving upward.
It is suitable not only to sweeten and soften the skin after bathing or showering, but also:
After shaving.After sun exposure (but even before in order to prepare the skin at best).After depilation.In case of contact with irritants (Detergents etc.).To moisturize and nourish the skin of children.

BODY LOTION is a natural product with organic extract, able to provide an immediate feeling of natural wellbeing and freshness, leaving a pleasant scent that will accompany you for the whole day. The natural fragrance absolutely neutral is loved by men and women and it's able to stay long on the skin, leaving a pleasant scent trail.

products.product_description:
